subject: Real Estate
title: FOMO: Fear of Missing Out on Housing
description: A quick win: understand FOMO: Fear of Missing Out on Housing.

hook.text: Prices rose 20% last year. If you don't buy now, you'll never afford a home. Or so it feels.

buildup.text: FOMO drives buyers to skip inspections, waive contingencies, and bid far above asking price.

discovery.text: The fear isn't just financial. It's social â€” the anxiety of falling behind your homeowning peers.

twist.text: FOMO peaks at the exact moment the market is most overvalued. Maximum fear coincides with maximum risk.

climax.text: The buyers who overpay at the top are the same ones who panic-sell at the bottom. FOMO works both ways.

punchline.text: The worst time to buy is when you're afraid not to.

quiz.question: When does FOMO peak in housing markets?
